title: Understanding Boolean Values
content: Another data type is the Boolean. Booleans may only be one of two value: true and false. They are basically little on-off switches, where true is on and false is off. These two states are mutually exclusive.

exercises.instruction: Modify the welcomeToBooleans function so that it returns true instead of false.
placeholder: // Only change code below this line
// Only change code above this line

hint: Booleans values are never written with quotes. The strings 'true' and 'false' are not Boolean and have no meaning in JavaScript.
The welcomeToBooleans() function should return a Boolean(true or false) value.
